translations: 味道差的，难吃的；讨人厌的，使人不快的

sentences.sentence: Only then did I learn the unpalatable truth.
sentences.translation: 直到那时我才得知令人难以接受的真相。

sentences.sentence: It was only then that I began to learn the unpalatable truth about John.
sentences.translation: 直到那时我才开始了解到有关约翰的令人难以接受的真相。

sentences.sentence: But before we try to emulate geniuses or encourage our children to do so we should note that some of the things we learn from them may prove unpalatable.
sentences.translation: 但在我们试图模仿天才或鼓励我们的孩子这样做之前，我们应该注意到，我们从他们身上学到的一些东西可能并不适合我们。
